titles.title: Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Legal Services Corporation.
Recognizing the 50th anniversary of the Legal Services Corporation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution commends the Legal Services Corporation and its grantees for assisting an estimated 76 million Americans over its 50 years. The resolution also calls for continued prioritization of funding for the Legal Services Corporation.
